description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。曾任立法院院长、副院长、立法委员、中国国民党副主席等职，是中华民国宪政史上最资深的立法委员，也是国会全面改选后任期最长的立法院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Kuomintang. He served as President of the Legislative Yuan, Vice President, Legislator, and Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang. He is the most senior legislator in the constitutional history of the Republic of China and the longest-serving President of the Legislative Yuan since its full reelection.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The unicameral legislature of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the main political parties in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、中国国民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 2013年9月发生在中华民国的政治事件，涉及总统马英九与立法院长王金平之间的权力斗争。
description.en: A political incident in Taiwan in September 2013, involving a power struggle between President Ma Ying-jeou and Legislative Yuan President Wang Jin-pyng.

nodes.id: 最高法院检察署特别侦查组

zh-cn: 最高法院检察署特别侦查组
en: Special Investigation Division of the Supreme Prosecutors Office

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高法院检察署内设立的特别检察官机构，负责侦办总统、副总统及五院院长等层级的贪渎与重大经济犯罪。
description.en: A special prosecutor's office established within the Supreme Prosecutors Office of the Republic of China, responsible for investigating corruption and major economic crimes involving high-level officials such as the President, Vice President, and heads of the five Yuans.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，现任立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, a member of the Democratic Progressive Party, and a current member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任法务部部长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国检察官，曾任台湾高等法院检察署检察长。
description.en: A prosecutor in the Republic of China who served as the Head Prosecutor of the Taiwan High Prosecutors Office.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央委员会考核纪律委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央委员会考核纪律委员会
en: Evaluation and Discipline Committee of the Kuomintang Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党内负责党员纪律审查与处分的机构。
description.en: The body within the Kuomintang responsible for reviewing and disciplining party members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任中国国民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, the current Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 由台湾大学生与公民团体共同发起的占领立法院的社会运动，旨在抗议《海峡两岸服务贸易协议》的审查程序。
description.en: A social movement initiated by Taiwanese university students and civic groups, occupying the Legislative Yuan to protest the review process of the Cross-Strait Service Trade Agreement.

nodes.id: 海峡两岸服务贸易协议

zh-cn: 海峡两岸服务贸易协议

description.zh-cn: 海峡两岸关系协会与海峡交流基金会签署的服务贸易协定，旨在开放两岸服务业市场。
description.en: A service trade agreement signed by ARATS and SEF, aimed at opening up the service industry markets across the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 为规范未来两岸协议的签订与审查程序而提出的法律草案，是太阳花学运的核心诉求之一。
description.en: A proposed bill to regulate the signing and review process of future cross-strait agreements, one of the core demands of the Sunflower Student Movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任立法院秘书长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Secretary-General of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的著名综合性大学。
description.en: A renowned comprehensive university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

nodes.id: 国立台南第一高级中学

zh-cn: 国立台南第一高级中学
台湾省立台南第一中学
en: National Tainan First Senior High School

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台南市的著名高级中学。
description.en: A renowned senior high school located in Tainan, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任立法院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任副总统及中国国民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as Vice President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

location.zh-cn: 日治台湾高雄州冈山郡
location.en: Okayama District, Takao Prefecture, Japanese Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾高雄州冈山郡的一个行政区，今高雄市路竹区。
description.en: An administrative division of Okayama District, Takao Prefecture during the Japanese rule of Taiwan, now Luzhu District, Kaohsiung City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，润泰集团总裁。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur, President of Ruentex Group.

description.zh-cn: 王金平出生于日治台湾高雄州冈山郡路竹庄。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng was born in Luzhu Zhuang, Okayama District, Takao Prefecture, Japanese Taiwan.

relationships.target: 国立台南第一高级中学

degree.en: Junior and Senior High School graduate

description.zh-cn: 王金平毕业于台湾省立台南第一中学（今国立台南第一高级中学）初中部及高中部。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng graduated from the junior and senior high school departments of Taiwan Provincial Tainan First Senior High School (now National Tainan First Senior High School).

description.zh-cn: 王金平考入台湾省立师范学院（今国立台湾师范大学）数学系并毕业。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng was admitted to and graduated from the Department of Mathematics at Taiwan Provincial Normal College (now National Taiwan Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 王金平自1975年起当选立法委员，任期长达44年。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng was elected as a legislator since 1975, serving for 44 years.

description.zh-cn: 王金平担任第二、三届立法院副院长。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng served as the Vice President of the Legislative Yuan for the 2nd and 3rd terms.

description.zh-cn: 王金平担任第四至八届立法院院长，共17年，是国会全面改选后任期最长的院长。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng served as the President of the Legislative Yuan from the 4th to the 8th terms for 17 years, becoming the longest-serving president since the full reelection of the parliament.

description.zh-cn: 王金平于2000年被选为中国国民党副主席。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng was elected as the Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，王金平在中国国民党主席选举中败于马英九。2013年，时任总统兼党主席的马英九就关说案对王金平发起政治斗争，即九月政争，试图撤销其党籍与立法院长职务。
description.en: In 2005, Wang Jin-pyng was defeated by Ma Ying-jeou in the KMT chairmanship election. In 2013, then-President and KMT Chairman Ma Ying-jeou initiated a political struggle against Wang over an alleged lobbying case, known as the September Strife, attempting to revoke his party membership and position as President of the Legislative Yuan.

relationships.source: 最高法院检察署特别侦查组

description.zh-cn: 特侦组指控王金平为立法委员柯建铭的司法案件进行关说，引发九月政争。
description.en: The Special Investigation Division accused Wang Jin-pyng of improper lobbying in a judicial case involving legislator Ker Chien-ming, triggering the September Strife.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统兼国民党主席的马英九召开记者会严厉批判王金平，并推动国民党考纪会撤销其党籍，是九月政争的主要推手。
description.en: Then-President and KMT Chairman Ma Ying-jeou held press conferences to severely criticize Wang Jin-pyng and pushed the KMT's Discipline Committee to revoke his party membership, acting as the main driver of the September Strife.

description.zh-cn: 在九月政争期间，王金平被国民党考纪会决议撤销党籍，面临失去不分区立委及立法院长资格的危机。后经司法诉讼及国民党新任主席朱立伦停止诉讼，才确认党籍。
description.en: During the September Strife, the KMT Discipline Committee resolved to revoke Wang Jin-pyng's party membership, facing the crisis of losing his legislator-at-large status and his position as President of the Legislative Yuan. His membership was only confirmed after legal proceedings and the new KMT Chairman Eric Chu's decision to drop the lawsuit.

description.zh-cn: 在九月政争中，王金平被指控为柯建铭的司法案件关说法务部长曾勇夫与高检署检察长陈守煌。
description.en: During the September Strife, Wang Jin-pyng was accused of lobbying Minister of Justice Tseng Yung-fu and Head Prosecutor Chen Shou-huang on behalf of Ker Chien-ming's judicial case.

description.zh-cn: 因被指控在王金平的关说案中涉入，曾勇夫被迫请辞法务部部长。
description.en: Tseng Yung-fu was forced to resign as Minister of Justice due to his alleged involvement in the lobbying case concerning Wang Jin-pyng.

relationships.source: 中国国民党中央委员会考核纪律委员会

description.zh-cn: 在九月政争中，国民党考纪会决议撤销王金平的党籍。
description.en: During the September Strife, the KMT's Evaluation and Discipline Committee resolved to revoke Wang Jin-pyng's party membership.

description.zh-cn: 国民党新任主席朱立伦宣布停止对王金平党籍案的诉讼，确认其保有党籍。
description.en: The new KMT chairman, Eric Chu, announced the cessation of the lawsuit concerning Wang Jin-pyng's party membership, confirming that he retained his membership.

relationships.target: 海峡两岸服务贸易协议

description.zh-cn: 太阳花学运旨在抗议《海峡两岸服务贸易协议》的审查程序，并成功阻止了其通过。
description.en: The Sunflower Student Movement aimed to protest the review process of the Cross-Strait Service Trade Agreement and successfully blocked its passage.

relationships.target: 海峡两岸服务贸易协议

description.zh-cn: 为回应太阳花学运，立法院长王金平承诺在《两岸协议监督条例》完成立法前，不召集《服贸协议》的相关党团协商会议，实际上搁置了该协议。
description.en: In response to the Sunflower Student Movement, Legislative Yuan President Wang Jin-pyng promised not to convene party caucus negotiations on the Service Trade Agreement until the Cross-Strait Agreement Supervisory Bill was enacted, effectively shelving the agreement.

description.zh-cn: 为结束太阳花学运，王金平承诺优先处理《两岸协议监督条例》的立法，将其作为审查《服贸协议》的前提条件。
description.en: To end the Sunflower Student Movement, Wang Jin-pyng promised to prioritize the legislation of the Cross-Strait Agreement Supervisory Bill as a precondition for reviewing the Service Trade Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 林锡山长期担任立法院秘书长，是时任立法院院长王金平的幕僚长。
description.en: Lin Hsi-shan served for a long time as the Secretary-General of the Legislative Yuan, acting as the chief of staff to then-President of the Legislative Yuan Wang Jin-pyng.

position.en: Vice President of the Legislative Yuan

description.zh-cn: 王金平在刘松藩担任立法院院长期间，任立法院副院长。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng served as the Vice President of the Legislative Yuan while Liu Sung-pan was the President.

description.zh-cn: 王金平在连战担任中国国民党主席期间，任副主席。
description.en: Wang Jin-pyng served as Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang while Lien Chan was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 王金平在彰化进德实验中学实习时，润泰集团总裁尹衍梁曾是他的高一学生。
description.en: When Wang Jin-pyng was an intern teacher at Changhua Jinde Experimental High School, Ruentex Group President Samuel Yin was his first-year high school student.
